com.mattwilliamsnyc.service.remix
Class Response

java.lang.Object
  com.mattwilliamsnyc.service.remix.Response
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProductResponse, ProductsResponse, StoreResponse, StoresResponse
public class Response
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for all responses to a Remix API call.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Matt Williams
